00086 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00087 #include "config.h"
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 
00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 
00098 #include <unistd.h>
00099 #include <sys/types.h>
00100 #include <sys/param.h>
00101 #include <time.h>
00102 #include <pthread.h>
00103  
00104 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_readlink( cache_entry_t        * pentry, 
00105                                            fsal_path_t          * plink_content ,
00106                                            hash_table_t         * ht,  /* Unused, kept for protototype's homogeneity */
00107                                            cache_inode_client_t       * pclient, 
00108                                            fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00109                                            cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00110 {
00111   fsal_status_t fsal_status ;
00112   
00113   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00114   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00115 
00116   /* stats */
00117   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00118   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00119 
00120   /* Lock the entry */
00121   P( pentry->lock ) ;
00122   
00123 
00124   if( cache_inode_renew_entry( pentry, NULL, ht, pclient, pcontext, pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00125     {
00126       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00127       V( pentry->lock ) ; 
00128       return *pstatus ;
00129     }
00130 
00131   switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00132     {
00133     case REGULAR_FILE:    
00134     case DIR_BEGINNING:
00135     case DIR_CONTINUE:
00136     case CHARACTER_FILE:
00137     case BLOCK_FILE:
00138     case SOCKET_FILE:
00139     case FIFO_FILE:
00140       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE ;
00141       V( pentry->lock ) ;
00142 
00143        /* stats */
00144       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00145       
00146       return *pstatus ;
00147       break ;
00148       
00149     case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00150       fsal_status = FSAL_pathcpy( plink_content, &(pentry->object.symlink.content) )  ;
00151       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00152         {
00153           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00154           V( pentry->lock ) ;
00155 
00156           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00157            {
00158               cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00159 
00160               DisplayLog( "cache_inode_readlink: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry ) ;
00161 
00162               if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00163                  DisplayLog( "cache_inode_readlink: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00164 
00165               *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00166            }
00167           /* stats */
00168           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00169           
00170           return *pstatus ;
00171         }
00172       
00173       break ;
00174     }
00175 
00176 
00177   /* Release the entry */
00178   *pstatus = cache_inode_valid( pentry, CACHE_INODE_OP_GET, pclient ) ;  
00179   V( pentry->lock ) ;
00180   
00181   /* stat */
00182    if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00183      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00184    else
00185      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_READLINK] += 1 ;
00186   
00187   return *pstatus ;
00188 } /* cache_inode_readlink */
